e="preserve">Richard Henry Pitt Mason (born 3 March 1934), also known as R.H.P. Mason'", is an Australian academic, historian and Japanologist. He is a professor at the Australian National University in Canberra.
Selected works.
In an overview of writings by and about Mason, OCLC/WorldCat lists roughly 10+ works in 50+ publications in 5 languages and 1,900+ library holdings.
